item.title: Secure your Wireless Router
item.description: There are a number of steps you can take to stop a hacker from gaining entry to your home network. Change administrator passwords This is one of the most common points of entry for someone to gain access to your home network. The router you received from your ISP generally all come with a set number of Wi-Fi SSIDs and wireless keys â€“ usually printed on the rear of the router.
